div.p: a) The locations for which COI Barcode Data were available from BOLD for Merops apiaster (Group II). The black triangles indicate localities with GPS coordinates, the red circles indicate countries for which GPS data were not available, and the blue squares indicate the study site (Aras River Research Station). b) Neighbor-joining tree. c) Haplotype network, where colors indicate the origin of the haplotypes (Green: Russia, Purple: Turkey).
